item.title: SlideApp for Google Slides
item.description: Gists By recent Google updated, Class SlideApp is added to Google Slides. SlideApp will be bring a lot of applications. Here, I would like to introduce 2 samples. 1. Sidebar function showSidebar() { var html = HtmlService .createHtmlOutput('Hello, world! <input type="button" value="Close" onclick="google.script.host.close()" />') .setTitle('My custom sidebar') .setWidth(300); SlidesApp.getUi().showSidebar(html); } 2. Copy slides in existing Slide to a new Slide This sample script create a new Slide with slides you want to copy.
